name: CUneXus Solutions
tag_list: credit, loan, lending, finance, financial, credit-union, lender, bank, software, loan-origination, crm, automation, mobile, internet, sales, marketing, direct-marketing, pos, sas, credit-card, mortgage, auto, home-equity
overview:
CUneXus Solutions Inc. develops specialized business automation, POS, eCommerce and direct marketing software systems that aid lending institutions in maximizing the profitability of customer relationships. At the foundation of the company’s product and service offerings is Comprehensive Pre-Screened Lending (CPL) Strategy — an award-winning consumer lending strategy that has demonstrated the ability to significantly reduce new loan acquisition costs, increase sales volume, and enhance customer experience and satisfaction.

CUneXus’ Comprehensive Pre-Screened Lending (CPL) strategies fuse automated risk assessment, pricing, direct marketing, retail sales support, delivery channel management, and point-of-sale acceptance and fulfillment.

Released to the U.S. credit union market in late 2012, the company’s cplXpress product suite facilitates implementation of CPL marketing and sales strategy, and is the first of a series of software products aimed at re-engineering the port-crisis lender/consumer dynamic and making an immediate impact on the new, more rational and informed, way customers and institutions will interact in the financial sector of the 21st century.

At the heart of the product suite is cplXpress - a rules engine and campaign dashboard that applies the patents-pending CPL processes that enable a lender to communicate their entire suite of loan products to customers 24/7/365. Recipients are presented personalized product sets and pricing on a preapproved basis (no loan application necessary), with the ability to accept loan offers and complete preapproved purchase transactions at a nearly on-demand basis.

The company’s mission is to foster deeper customer relationships and re-establish lending institutions as trusted resources, while boosting convenience, efficiency, sales volume and ROI.
